explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a split-screen. The upper part shows a person shaping brown material in a plate with their hands. The lower part shows two young men and a young woman looking at something on a phone. The woman is wearing a black top and holding the phone in her left hand. The man on the left is wearing a blue and white checkered shirt with a white inner shirt, and the man on the right is wearing a gray T-shirt.

[0-6] The hands in the upper part of the screen are pulling up on the brown sugar, and the three people in the lower part are looking at the phone and exclaiming. Then the scene switches to a room with beige cabinets, where only the man in the blue and white checkered shirt is visible. He rolls up his sleeves and crosses his arms. In front of him is a table with plates, a bottle, and a black cup. The shot then cuts to a young woman in a black shirt, blowing on and wiping a plate. Then the shot cuts to the man in the gray T-shirt, who is moving his wrists and then crossing his arms. On the table in front of him are purple flowers and some other objects.
